original_text: And alas for women who are pregnant and for those who are nursing infants in those days!
korean_text: 그 날에는 아이 밴 자들과 젖먹이는 자들에게 화가 있으리로다

sentences.original_text: And alas for women who are pregnant
and for those who are nursing infants
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 젖먹이를 품에 안은 자들도 슬프도다
